question: Will ApeCoin (APE) be below $4.20 on 4/20/2022?
description:
This is a market on if the price of ApeCoin (APE) will be below $4.20 in USD on April 20, 2022 (4.20.2022). 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if ApeCoin ($APE) has a candlestick closing price of $4.19 or less, as per the resolution source, on April 20, 2022, 12pm ET, and “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/apecoin).

This market will resolve according to the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Wed 20 April 2022, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET.

The check will be at 12:30 PM ET, April 20, 2022.

question: Will the floor price of Bored Apes be under 69 ETH on 4/20/2022?
description:
This is a market on whether Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) will maintain a floor price of under 69 ETH on April 20, 2022 (at 12:00 PM ET), according to https://opensea.io/collection/boredapeyachtclub.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, on the aforementioned check time, there is at least one Bored Ape listed for sale for less than 69 ETH on the official Bored Ape Yacht Club collection page on OpenSea. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market. List time for an NFT can be found under “Trading History” by clicking the “Listing” filter and hovering over the date.

Note that the exact price at the check time will be used. If no floor price is available at the check time, the source will be checked every following hour. For valid listings that are declining price auctions, the price exactly at the check time will be used, NOT the price at the initial listing time.
